attributes.action: Change the new school starters start date to January 2021 because of covid-19.
attributes.additional_details:
I feel this would be beneficial to so many children.
If they get moved to the next year group in September alot of children will struggle. Emotionally & developmentally wont be ready. Especially EYFS & infants. It could have big impacts on them.
The children in reception will not have gained all the important skills they need in there first year in school. 
Preschool children will not have had enough focus on being school ready either and will miss important transitions.

Please consider this.
attributes.background:
If the social distancing and school closure remains until the end of summer 2020 term. 
Please consider changing the new school starters to January 2021 and leave the current children in the same school year until then.
